result.markdown: --- title: "Covariance models" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:----------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |5g |Selection of covariance structures |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w5g_covarianceselection.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/_LDX9RnF7A0)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_5g_covarianceselection.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_5g_covarianceselection.R)| |5h |Group heteroscedasticity |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w5h_groupheteroscedasticity.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/K2xJy2J6-ws)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_5h_groupheteroscedasticity.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_5h_groupheteroscedasticity.R)| |6a |Group effects |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6a_groupeffects.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/CVpRY1LYwU8)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6a_groupeffects.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6a_groupeffects.R)| ::: ::: -
